title: Powerful / chilling from start to finish
review: This film was respectfully done. Very non Hollywood. No sappy music or heroic speeches. Just very raw and very real. I'm not one to be moved by a film but watching the first half the viewer is tempted to want to jump on the screen and warn the characters of their fate. It's a shame this film wasn't a bigger hit as it deserves a place in motion picture history. The only complaint I had is that the lady from the TV show Wings was playing one of the passengers which was a distraction and break in the reality of the moment. This film was not gory as I expected it to be. The blood was kept to a minimum but used enough to exhibit the horror of what happened.
